messages.content: You are an expert sports scientist and strength & conditioning coach specializing in personalized training programs.

Create a workout plan for me. I'm a basketball player, intermediate level, looking to improve performance and strength. I can train 4 days a week for 60 minutes. I have access to a gym with basic equipment.

{
  "id": "wp-basketball-intermediate",
  "name": "Basketball Performance Enhancement Plan",
  "description": "A 4-day training program designed to improve basketball-specific performance, focusing on strength, power, agility, and conditioning for intermediate players.",
  "level": "intermediate",
  "goals": ["performance", "strength"],
  "equipment": ["barbell", "dumbbell", "bench", "resistance bands"],
  "weeklyPlan": [
    {
      "day": "Day 1",
      "focus": "Lower Body Strength & Power",
      "duration": "60 min",
      "warmup": "5 minutes light jogging, dynamic stretches focusing on hip mobility, ankle mobility drills",
      "exercises": [
        {
          "name": "Barbell Squats",
          "sets": "4",
          "reps": "6-8",
          "rest": "90 sec",
          "notes": "Focus on depth and maintaining proper form"
        },
        {
          "name": "Box Jumps",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "8",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Explosive movement, soft landing"
        },
        {
          "name": "Walking Lunges",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "10 each leg",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Hold dumbbells for added resistance"
        },
        {
          "name": "Calf Raises",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "15",
          "rest": "45 sec",
          "notes": "Full range of motion"
        },
        {
          "name": "Lateral Bounds",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "8 each side",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Focus on stability upon landing"
        }
      ],
      "cooldown": "5 minutes static stretching for quads, hamstrings, and calves"
    }
  ]
}
You are an expert sports scientist and strength & conditioning coach specializing in personalized training programs.
I need a workout plan. I'm a beginner with weight loss goals. I can only train 3 days a week for 30 minutes. I only have dumbbells and resistance bands at home.

{
  "id": "wp-beginner-weight-loss",
  "name": "Home Weight Loss Program for Beginners",
  "description": "A 3-day home workout program designed for beginners focusing on weight loss, using minimal equipment while maximizing calorie burn and building foundational strength.",
  "level": "beginner",
  "goals": ["weight loss", "health"],
  "equipment": ["dumbbells", "resistance bands"],
  "weeklyPlan": [
    {
      "day": "Day 1",
      "focus": "Full Body Circuit",
      "duration": "30 min",
      "warmup": "5 minutes of marching in place, arm circles, and light dynamic stretches",
      "exercises": [
        {
          "name": "Dumbbell Squats",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "12",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Hold dumbbells at shoulders or sides"
        },
        {
          "name": "Dumbbell Push Press",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "10",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Start with dumbbells at shoulders, use legs to help press overhead"
        },
        {
          "name": "Resistance Band Rows",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "12",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Anchor band to a sturdy object at chest height"
        },
        {
          "name": "Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "10",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Focus on hip hinge movement, slight knee bend"
        },
        {
          "name": "Mountain Climbers",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "30 seconds",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Keep core engaged, moderate pace"
        }
      ],
      "cooldown": "5 minutes of walking in place followed by full-body static stretching"
    }
  ]
}
You are an expert sports scientist and strength & conditioning coach specializing in personalized training programs.
I'm a marathon runner looking to improve my endurance and prevent injuries. I can train 5 days a week for 45-90 minutes depending on the day. I have access to a gym and running trails.

{
  "id": "wp-marathon-endurance",
  "name": "Marathon Runner's Endurance & Injury Prevention Plan",
  "description": "A 5-day training program designed for marathon runners, focusing on building endurance, improving running economy, and preventing common running injuries through strength training and proper recovery.",
  "level": "intermediate",
  "goals": ["endurance", "injury prevention"],
  "equipment": ["treadmill", "resistance bands", "foam roller", "stability ball"],
  "weeklyPlan": [
    {
      "day": "Day 1",
      "focus": "Easy Run + Core Stability",
      "duration": "60 min",
      "warmup": "10 minutes dynamic stretching focusing on hip mobility and ankle activation",
      "exercises": [
        {
          "name": "Easy Pace Run",
          "sets": "1",
          "reps": "30 minutes",
          "rest": "N/A",
          "notes": "Conversational pace, focus on form and breathing"
        },
        {
          "name": "Plank Variations",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "30-45 seconds each",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Include front plank, side planks, and bird-dog"
        },
        {
          "name": "Stability Ball Hamstring Curls",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "12",
          "rest": "45 sec",
          "notes": "Focus on controlled movement and hip stability"
        },
        {
          "name": "Resistance Band Lateral Walks",
          "sets": "2",
          "reps": "15 steps each direction",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Keep tension on the band throughout the movement"
        },
        {
          "name": "Foam Rolling Session",
          "sets": "1",
          "reps": "5 min",
          "rest": "N/A",
          "notes": "Focus on calves, quads, hamstrings, and IT bands"
        }
      ],
      "cooldown": "5 minutes static stretching focusing on major running muscle groups"
    }
  ]
}
You are an expert sports scientist and strength & conditioning coach specializing in personalized training programs.
I'm a soccer player (defender) looking to improve my speed, agility, and strength. I train 4 days a week for 75 minutes. I have access to a full gym and soccer field.

{
  "id": "wp-soccer-defender",
  "name": "Soccer Defender Performance Program",
  "description": "A 4-day training program designed for soccer defenders, focusing on improving speed, agility, strength, and position-specific skills to enhance on-field performance.",
  "level": "advanced",
  "goals": ["speed", "agility", "strength"],
  "equipment": ["barbell", "dumbbell", "agility ladder", "cones", "medicine ball"],
  "weeklyPlan": [
    {
      "day": "Day 1",
      "focus": "Lower Body Strength & Power",
      "duration": "75 min",
      "warmup": "10 minutes of light jogging, dynamic stretches, and activation exercises",
      "exercises": [
        {
          "name": "Barbell Back Squats",
          "sets": "4",
          "reps": "6",
          "rest": "2 min",
          "notes": "Focus on explosive concentric phase"
        },
        {
          "name": "Bulgarian Split Squats",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "8 each leg",
          "rest": "90 sec",
          "notes": "Hold dumbbells for added resistance"
        },
        {
          "name": "Weighted Box Jumps",
          "sets": "4",
          "reps": "6",
          "rest": "2 min",
          "notes": "Hold light dumbbells, focus on height and soft landing"
        },
        {
          "name": "Barbell Hip Thrusts",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "10",
          "rest": "90 sec",
          "notes": "Full range of motion, squeeze glutes at top"
        },
        {
          "name": "Lateral Bounds with Stabilization",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "6 each direction",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Focus on sticking the landing and maintaining balance"
        }
      ],
      "cooldown": "10 minutes of foam rolling and static stretching"
    }
  ]
}
You are an expert sports scientist and strength & conditioning coach specializing in personalized training programs.

I'm a senior (65 years old) looking to maintain mobility and strength. I can exercise 3 days a week for 45 minutes. I have arthritis in my knees and prefer low-impact exercises. I have resistance bands and light dumbbells at home.

{
  "id": "wp-senior-mobility",
  "name": "Senior Mobility & Strength Maintenance Program",
  "description": "A gentle 3-day program designed for seniors with knee arthritis, focusing on maintaining functional strength, improving mobility, and enhancing quality of life through low-impact exercises.",
  "level": "beginner",
  "goals": ["mobility", "strength maintenance", "joint health"],
  "equipment": ["light dumbbells", "resistance bands", "chair"],
  "weeklyPlan": [
    {
      "day": "Day 1",
      "focus": "Upper Body Strength & Posture",
      "duration": "45 min",
      "warmup": "10 minutes of gentle marching in place, shoulder rolls, and neck stretches",
      "exercises": [
        {
          "name": "Seated Resistance Band Chest Press",
          "sets": "2",
          "reps": "12",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Anchor band behind chair, focus on good posture"
        },
        {
          "name": "Standing Wall Push-ups",
          "sets": "2",
          "reps": "10",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Adjust difficulty by changing distance from wall"
        },
        {
          "name": "Seated Resistance Band Rows",
          "sets": "2",
          "reps": "12",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Focus on squeezing shoulder blades together"
        },
        {
          "name": "Light Dumbbell Lateral Raises",
          "sets": "2",
          "reps": "10",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Use very light weights, focus on controlled movement"
        },
        {
          "name": "Seated Overhead Press",
          "sets": "2",
          "reps": "10",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Use light dumbbells, maintain good posture"
        }
      ],
      "cooldown": "10 minutes of gentle stretching for shoulders, chest, and back"
    }
  ]
}
